name: Die Austreibung des Anderen
desc: Every time an enemy target receives a DoT, regenerates 1.0 Energy for a random ally target. Enemy targets can trigger this effect for a max of 20 time(s) in one turn.
enhanced_desc: Every time an enemy target receives a DoT, regenerates 1.5 Energy for a random ally target. Enemy targets can trigger this effect for a max of 20 time(s) in one turn.
